Upgrade.Title: Monotanium Armor Plating
Upgrade.Ability: Whenever an enemy ship attempts to acquire a target lock on your ship, roll 2 defense dice. If you roll at least 1 [EVADE] result, the [TARGET LOCK] Action has no effect. No ship may be equipped with more than 1 "Monotanium Armor Plating" Upgrade. ACTION: Disable this card to remove a red [TARGET LOCK] Token from beside your ship (and the corresponding blue [TARGET LOCK] Token from beside the locking ship).

Upgrade.Title: Sensor Network
Upgrade.Ability: During the Planning Phase, after all ships have chosen their Maneuvers, you may disable this card to target one ship anywhere in the play area, look at t hat ship's Maneuver Dial, and then choose your Maneuver. The target ship cannot change its Maneuver after you have looked at it. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Hirogen ship.

Upgrade.Title: Intercept Course
Upgrade.Ability: You may discard this card immediately before you move in order to change your Maneuver for this round. If an enemy ship is in your forward firing arc after you complete this move, you may perform a [BATTLESTATIONS] Action as a free Action. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Hirogen ship and costs +5 SP for any Captain other than Karr or a Hirogen Captain.

Upgrade.Title: Stalking Mode
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 1-3. The target ship's Skill Number is reduced by 2. In addition, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die against the target ship. Both of these effects last until the end of the game.

Upgrade.Title: Full Reverse
Upgrade.Ability: During the Activation Phase, after you reveal your Maneuver Dial, but before you move, you may discard this card to perform a 1 [REVERSE] or 2 [REVERSE] Full Astern Maneuver instead of your chosen Maneuver. Treat this new Maneuver as a White Maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Subnucleonic Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. In addition to inflicting normal damage, for each uncancelled [HIT] or [CRIT] result, disable 1 [CREW] Upgrade on the target ship of your choice. This Upgrade costs +5 SP for any ship other than a Hirogen ship.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert one of your [BATTLESTATIONS] results into a [CRIT] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.
